column3: “I loaded up my pipe with ground 'Outlaw' bud. The first draw was a unique mix of sweetened spice and pine. The first hit threw me into a coughing jag and after the next few hits I felt the first wave of numbing followed by a few random ideas flowing in my head connecting to each other giving me a profound awareness and realization that I was about to get seriously baked as a result of my present act. This then progre...”

“Immediately felt uplifted! I would definitely recommended this strain for groups because the conversations are so much better after a hit of this stuff. Eyes got a little dry but that's because I didn't have the urge to blink for like 3 full minutes.”
“Very very good, I smoked it and with in 5 minutes I was happy and clear headed without a worry in the world”
“One of my new favorites. Very quickly received an any stress and happier than ever. Perfect for anxiety. Also had the ability to either nap or get things done. Good anytime of the day.”
“So nice got an nice high within mins.  No problems leaving me pretty spaced out.”

“Extremly smooth and inducing headhigh. Hitted from vaporizer at 185°C All i can really feel that i'm superhigh, kinda relaxed and ephoric. Feel also very energetic, this gave me boost at latehight and could stay for hours just do favorite things, gaming, internet etc..”
“just in the middle of growing this strain .and reading all the good I new  picked a winner”

“I had my first run-in with this strain in Washington about two weeks ago. I've been smoking for a while, and I feel.....pretty immune. Two hits of this and I'm GONE. 

Wonderfully uplifting, tastes great, hits like a German tank. Couldn't ask for more.”
“Subpar effects. Quick acting but fades rapidly. Mildly relieved shoulder pain. Energy provided but after a couple of hours I was couch bound and in need of a stronger med.”
“Outlaws extract by GoldenXtrX is a Mellow and smooth hit. It has a light skunk flavor.. yet earthy. I found it VERY likable.”
“Golden Xtrx Oil Cartridge of this strain felt amazing. Uplifting, euphoric, and heady with a sweet taste! Highly recommended for any sativa lover!”
“In a Golden XTRX pen, this is my absolute day-time favorite. I'm aware and focused -- even maybe a dash creative -- and I'm not stony
column4:
but rather fresh feeling. Also, the munchies are fairly minimal, which is great. 

It's hard to find the cartridges sometimes, but well worth the drive to find them.”

column3: “average sativa, not so tasty nor uplifting, gets my body nervous”
